title: Plat ADC LF a Support in Bronze-Gold Elo
body:
I main ADC in Plat, but am looking for a partner to climb with. I'd be using my smurf account, and climbing with you there. Climbing together will help build synergy for when we hit an elo that we're even with.

My most played and comfortable champs would be; Vayne, Ezreal, Jhin, Kalista, Sivir, Lucian.

My most preferred supports to be in lane with are; Nami, Janna, Thresh, Braum, and a good Zyra.

If you're interested please be mature, talkative and willing to take criticism both ways.

Add me on; same bro, or sajmonekpl
